sentences.en: Few men , drinking at a rivulet, stop to consider its source.
sentences.cn: 饮水小河边,无人思其源.

sentences.en: I see you hold the edge of your skirt strid a rivulet.
sentences.cn: 我看见你提起裙裾跨过小河.

sentences.en: In one of the ravines I came upon a hollow full of spring water which overflowed as a little rivulet, where sported tiny fish battling their way up the current.
sentences.cn: 在一个沟壑中，我偶然发现了一块洼地，充满了像小河般涌流的泉水，小鱼在其中嬉戏，竞相着逆流而上。

sentences.en: It reminds you of a placid rivulet.
sentences.cn: 它使人想起一条平静的溪流.

sentences.en: It reminds you of placid rivulet, meandering smoothly through green pastures and shaded by pleasant trees.
sentences.cn: 它使人想起一条平静的溪流, 蜿蜒畅游过绿茵的草场,浓荫遮蔽.

sentences.en: The maternal love is a rill, when the brook brook rivulet moistens our heart ~.
sentences.cn: 母爱是一条小溪, 如涓涓细流无时滋润我们的心田~.

sentences.en: The ploughs crossed and recrossed the rivulet marks.
sentences.cn: 耕犁在雨水流过的迹印上来回地划了一列列的犁沟.

sentences.en: The rivulet is a kind of water current form in the natural mountain brook.
sentences.cn: 溪流是自然山涧中的一种水流形式.

sentences.en: The school is located near the rivulet.
The tangential movement of water rivulet has significant effects on the rain - wind induced vibration of stay - cables.
sentences.cn: 风雨环境中斜拉索表面形成的水线及其周向摆动在索的风雨振中起着关键的作用.

sentences.en: They passed the dry bed of a rivulet.
sentences.cn: 他们跨过了一道干涸的河床.

trans.tran_en: a very small stream of water or liquid
